title: House “Weaponization” Committee Arms Itself, Takes Aim at Biden, FBI
description:
Rep. Jim Jordan launched his Select Subcommittee on the Weaponization of the Federal Government at a familiar set of right-wing talking points.

The post House “Weaponization” Committee Arms Itself, Takes Aim at Biden, FBI appeared first on The Intercept.

title: U.S. Hypocrisy on War Crimes Is a Gift to Putin
description:
The failure to prosecute American officials and other powerful nations for war crimes has created a jurisdictional mess.

The post U.S. Hypocrisy on War Crimes Is a Gift to Putin appeared first on The Intercept.

title: How the FBI Infiltrated Racial Justice Protests in 2020
description:
A new podcast from reporter Trevor Aaronson details the story of an FBI informant who infiltrated the racial justice movement in Denver.

The post How the FBI Infiltrated Racial Justice Protests in 2020 appeared first on The Intercept.
